title: Settings

emptyState.title: No API Providers
emptyState.description: Configure LLM API providers to use AI features. Supports OpenAI, Anthropic, Ollama, xAI, Google, and more.

dialog.deleteConfirm:
Are you sure you want to delete provider "{{name}}"?

This will also delete the stored API Key and cannot be undone.

placeholders.name: e.g., OpenAI Official, Ollama Local
placeholders.model: Leave empty to use default model
placeholders.apiKeyKeepExisting: Leave empty to keep existing key

helpText.leaveEmptyForDefault: Leave empty to use default model
helpText.apiKeyKeepExisting: Leave empty to keep existing key, or enter new key to update
helpText.apiKeyRotation: Supports multiple key rotation (comma separated), system will automatically rotate for load balancing
helpText.configJsonHint: Advanced config, e.g., model, temperature, etc. (JSON format)
helpText.aliasesHint: Set aliases for this provider, JSON array format, e.g., ["claude", "anthropic"]
helpText.onlyOneActive: Only one active provider at a time
helpText.selectPresetHint: Click cards above to quickly fill config, or manually fill the form below

validation.baseUrlMustStartWithHttp: Base URL must start with http:// or https://
validation.maxTokensMin: Max Tokens must be greater than 0
validation.apiKeyMinLength: API Key must be at least 10 characters
validation.multiKeyInvalid: Invalid multi-key format, use comma to separate at least 2 keys
validation.eachKeyMinLength: Each key must be at least 10 characters
validation.aliasesElementsMustBeString: Each element in aliases array must be a string

page.selectToEdit: Select a provider from the left to edit, or add a new provider

deleteConfirm:
Are you sure you want to delete provider "{{name}}"?

This will also delete the stored API Key and cannot be undone.

openai.label: OpenAI
openai.description: Official OpenAI API, supports GPT-4, GPT-3.5 and other models

anthropic.label: Anthropic
anthropic.description: Anthropic Claude series, including Claude 3.5 Sonnet

google.label: Google Gemini
google.description: Google Gemini (ML Dev API), uses API Key authentication

googleVertex.label: Google Vertex AI
googleVertex.description: Google Vertex AI Public Preview (API Key URL parameter)

ollama.label: Ollama
ollama.description: Local Ollama service, no API Key required

xai.label: X AI (Grok)
xai.description: xAI Grok series, supports Grok-2 and other models

openaiCompatible.label: OpenAI Compatible / Third-party Services
openaiCompatible.description: Third-party services compatible with OpenAI API format (DeepSeek, SiliconFlow, Zhipu, etc.)

openrouter.name: OpenRouter
openrouter.description: Unified API access to multiple models
